name: Ragdoll Madness
description:
Ragdoll Madness

is a physics based game. Complete levels by solving puzzles,
Take control of your character with physics-based ragdoll mechanics! Move and Grab the objects and Solve Puzzles!

Create your own levels or mods Unity Engine!

You can create Mod or Map using Unity Engine and C#!
It depends on your imagination, You can see how to do it in the community section!

Split Screen!

If you have Keyboard and Gamepad, You can play with friend Split-Screen!
and You can Play with Remote Play Together!


Keyboard

WASD - Movement
Arrow Keys - Movement
Mouse Buttons (Hold) - Grab Objects

Gamepad

Joystick - Movement
Left Trigger,Right Trigger - Grab Objects
